settings.content: Theme settings allow designers to provide an easy way for any user to customize the look and feel of their shop without having to delve into HTML or CSS code. Please see our [help page on theme settings](http://docs.shopify.com/themes/theme-templates/settings) to learn more about how you can make the theme customizable.

settings.label: Color Primary
settings.info: Used for text links, background title, title color.
Quickview will disable on Mobile, Tablet

settings.label: Enable Swatch Variants?
settings.info: You can enable or disable swatch variants for Quickview

settings.label: Template Wishlist
settings.info: You must Create new page wishlist with template page.wishlist

settings.label: Enable Float Header
settings.info: You can active float header or not.

settings.label: Custom logo
settings.info: Maximum logo dimensions are 450px wide by 200px high. The uploaded file will be resized to fit within those constraints.

settings.label: 1st Menu Item
settings.info: Menu item of main-menu. Menu item has dropdown megamenu.

settings.label: 1st Content HTML
settings.info: You can input HTML code, img tag, video code, ...

settings.label: 2nd Menu Item
settings.info: Menu item of main-menu. Menu item has dropdown megamenu.

settings.label: 2nd Content HTML
settings.info: You can input HTML code, img tag, video code, ...

settings.info: Menu item of main-menu. Menu item has dropdown megamenu.

settings.label: 3rd Content HTML
settings.info: You can input HTML code, img tag, video code, ...

settings.info: Menu item of main-menu. Menu item has dropdown megamenu.

settings.label: 5th Content HTML

settings.info: Menu item of main-menu. Menu item has dropdown megamenu.

settings.label: 6th Content HTML
settings.info: You can input HTML code, img tag, video code, ...

settings.label: Pause Time
settings.info: Milliseconds between the end of the sliding effect and the start of the next one

settings.label: Blog
settings.info: Choose blog to display on Homepage

settings.label: 1st Block Menu
settings.info: Choose menu for block. Add new menu: Admin -> Navigation

settings.label: 2nd Block Menu
settings.info: Choose menu for block. Add new menu: Admin -> Navigation

settings.label: Block Content
settings.info: You can input code html for content.

settings.label: Menu
settings.info: Choose menu for block. Add new menu: Admin->Navigation->Menu

settings.label: Enable Multiple choices?
settings.info: User can select multiple (Size, price, color) or only one (Size, price, color)
Located in the block CUSTOMIZE TAGS
Located in the block CUSTOMIZE TAGS
Located in the block CUSTOMIZE TAGS

settings.label: Number of products in a row
Number of products in a Page

settings.content: Uncheck if You use Newsletter of Shopify. Email will be saved to shopify customer. Admin -> Customers -> Accepts Marketting. You must send invite account for customer.

settings.label: MailChimp form action URL
settings.info: [Where do I find my MailChimp form action URL?](http://docs.shopify.com/support/configuration/store-customization/where-do-i-get-my-mailchimp-form-action)
